name: ElectriX
details: ElectriX is a manufacturer website with different type of tools.
featured: For a beautiful user interface used ReactJS.
Utilized NodeJS to create the REST API and implemented to load the services in the home page.
Implemented stripe payment to complete the payment of the selected service.
Applied a dashboard for users where he/she can see the orders and give a review.
Applied a dashboard for super admin who can add and manage services, Make another admin with an email address.

name: Pocket Gadget
details: Pocket Gadget is a warehouse management website with different kind of products
featured: Implemented a beautiful user interface with ReactJS.
Utilized NodeJS to create the REST API and implemented to load the products in the home page.
Implemented an authentication feature using firebase to checkout the selected product
Admin can manage a branch of products

name: Muscle Maniacs
details: Muscle Maniacs is a website where you can buy a service or a product.
featured: Implemented fake JSON data to load the services & products.
Applied an email-password and google authentication system.
Applied validation system for email and password.
Implemented a destination page to see the available products.

name: Review Studio
details: At Review Studio we are dedicated to reading and reviewing the very best fantasy books for both children and adults (both young and old).
featured: For a beautiful user interface used ReactJS.
Implemented fake JSON data to load the books & reviews.
Implemented a destination page to see the sales & revenue.
